vibesExplanation: The playlist consists predominantly of upbeat, high-energy tracks from the R&B, Soul, and Disco genres, such as 'Respect' by Aretha Franklin and 'I Will Survive' by Gloria Gaynor, which are known for their strong beats and danceable rhythms. The name 'Best walking songs' and the description suggest an intention to keep the listener energized and motivated. The tracks generally feature positive sentiments and empowering themes, aligning well with 'The Groove Session' vibe, which emphasizes expressive, feel-good movement with an emphasis on flow.
